text: Light over Russia () is a 1947 Soviet movie directed by Sergei Yutkevich.Чудо светаСвет над Россией (1947) It stars Nikolai Kolesnikov, Mikheil Gelovani, and Vasily Markov. == Actors == *Nikolai Kolesnikov as Vladimir Lenin *Mikheil Gelovani as Joseph Stalin *Vasily Markov as Felix Dzerzhinsky *Boris Olenin- Girshman as Gleb Krzhizhanovsky *Nikolay Okhlopkov as Anton Ivanovich Zabelin, engineer *Kira Golovko as Masha Zabelina (credited as K. Ivanova) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian movies Category:1947 movies Category:1940s historical movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Yutkevich
title: Light over Russia
